name: 3 Little Pigs & Bad Wolf
overview: Play 3 little pigs with parents and children An intelligence board game with parents and children Rules are very easy. The little children are also no problem Play with family and friends Player:1～4 person The story of "The Three Little Pigs" loved around the world Build a brick house to resist a bad wolf Who can build the house with the power of tactics and luck? Turn the roulette and move the pigs A bad wolf is chasing the pigs Run away to avoid being caught Collect the house parts The player who completed the brick house is the winner As an intelligence game Play rules are simple, play with the rules and the order can experience counting, communication, learning, planning, guessing, and more.
